AxeURL.title: The axe server url to point the extension at
AxeURL.description: Set to full url of your axe DevTools server

UsageServiceURL.title: Usage Service URL endpoint
UsageServiceURL.description: The url of the Usage Service to have data collected and sent to.

UsageServiceOrganization.title: Usage Service Organization
UsageServiceOrganization.description: The organization name to send to the Usage Service.

UsageServiceDepartment.title: Usage Service Department
UsageServiceDepartment.description: The department name to send to the Usage Service.

UsageServiceApplication.title: Usage Service Application
UsageServiceApplication.description: The application name to send to the Usage Service.

DataGather.title: Send usage data to the provided usage server
DataGather.description: If set to true, usage data will be collected and sent to our usage server

DisableIGT.title: Disable Intelligent Guided Testing in the extension
DisableIGT.description: If set to true, no Intelligent Guided Tests will be rendered anywhere in the extension

EnableIssueScreenshots.title: Capture screenshots of created issues
EnableIssueScreenshots.description: If set to true, screenshots will be captured when issues are created

WCAGLevel.title: A WCAG version and level to filter issues by
WCAGLevel.description: When set to a valid WCAG version and level only issues matching the set version and level will be displayed

AxeVersion.title: A valid axe version to use when scanning for automatic issues
AxeVersion.description: When set to a valid axe version, the provided axe version will be used when scanning for automatic issues.

IncludeNeedsReviewInIssueCount.title: Include needs review issues in automatic issue count
IncludeNeedsReviewInIssueCount.description: If set to false, needs review issues will no longer be included in the automatic issue count.

AutomaticColorContrastReview.title: Only allow manual automatic color contrast reviews
AutomaticColorContrastReview.description: If set to "manual", automatic color contrast reviews can only be run manually.

EnableMachineLearning.title: Capture screenshots and send them to ML servers to be processed.
EnableMachineLearning.description: If set to true, some IGTs use will use Machine Learning (ML) to optimize testing.

EnableAutomaticColorContrast.title: Enables the automatic color contrast review tool
EnableAutomaticColorContrast.description: If set to true, screenshots will be captured when the automatic color contrast tool is run.

DisableAllScreenshots.title: Disables all optional screenshot capabilities
DisableAllScreenshots.description: If set to true, features requiring screenshots will be disabled.

DisableNeedsReview.title: Hides needs review issues entirely
DisableNeedsReview.description: If set to true, needs review issues won't be seen anywhere and automatic color contrast tool will be disabled
